      • detect

        public android.graphics.Bitmap detect(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                                      byte[] out)
        Performs disc detection
        Specified by:
        detect in interface Detector
        Parameters:
        bmp - image in which you want the detection to be used
        out - unused byte array, I imagined it as a way to communicate between detectors
        Returns:
        Bitmap image with a circle drawn at the position of the detected disc
